scripts.src:build: npx node-sass src -o "./hugo/static/assets/css" --indent-width=2 --output-style=expanded && npx postcss "./hugo/static/assets/css/lemonade.css" --use autoprefixer -d "./hugo/static/assets/css"
scripts.docs:build: cd ./ && cd hugo && hugo && rimraf public  && hugo --minify && npx move-cli public ../docs && cd ./
scripts.prime: npm run clean && npx node-sass src -o "./bin" --indent-width=2 --output-style=expanded && npx postcss "./bin/lemonade.css" --use autoprefixer -d "./bin" && npx postcss "./bin/lemonade.css" > "./bin/lemonade.min.css" -u cssnano && npm run docs:build && npm run src:build && git add . && git status
scripts.start: npx concurrently --kill-others "npm run src:serve" "npm run docs:serve"
